title: Cloudant warns you if emergency maintenance is happening

tosdr.tldr: Cloudant may temporarily suspend the availability of all or part of the Hosting Platform for reasons of public safety, security, maintenance, interoperability of services, data protection, or to perform work that is necessary to keep the service running, or for technical reasons. If emergency maintenance is required, you will be notified immediately.
